page.title: 02******Somerby School.*******
page.content:
Somerby School is very old. It was built in 1878. It is a Victorian building. It used to have toilets in the playground but a few years ago they had a modern block joined onto the school,also on the south east wall there used to be a window which had to bricked up when the new toilets where built. The school is heated by an oil fired boiler. The school has an old piano and we have a visiting music teacher one afternoon a week, we also have an art teacher on every wednesday afternoon. The school is group 1 and has two teachers a teaching head who has the junior class and an infant teacher.
Written by John Riley. Aged 11 yrs.
